4 ways to potentially lower investment taxes: 
1) Divide your investments into different account types based on tax-efficiency
2) When rebalancing, sell out of tax-advantaged accounts
3) Use a Roth IRA
4) Have a plan for how to withdraw money in retirement
https://t.co/tLbaOBsmHe
